info.name: canny_edge_detector
info.description: A module for determining the edges of an image using the Canny Edge Detector

inputs.name: sobel_horizontal_result
inputs.description: The result of convolving the original image with the "sobel_horizontal" kernel. This will give the value of Gx (the gradient in the x direction).

inputs.name: sobel_vertical_result
inputs.description: The result of convolving the original image with the "sobel_vertical" kernel. This will give the value of Gy (the gradient in the y direction).

outputs.name: image_edges
outputs.description: A new image displaying the edges of the original image.

outputs.name: gradient_orientation
outputs.description: An image displaying the gradient orientation for each pixel in the input image

outputs.name: gradient_intensity
outputs.description: An image displaying the gradient intensity for each pixel in the input image

parameters.name: high_threshold
parameters.description: The upper threshold to use during double thresholding

parameters.name: low_threshold
parameters.description: The lower threshold to use during double thresholding
